# bad.robot

> A developer blog by Toby Weston covering Java, concurrency, functional programming, Scala, agile coaching, Raspberry Pi projects, and developer tools.

This site contains long-form technical blog posts and tutorials aimed at professional software developers. Content spans 2008 to the present.

## Topics

- **Java**: Core Java programming, OOP design patterns, Java 8+ features, lambdas, streams, exceptions, annotations, generics
- **Concurrency**: Java threading, locks, deadlock detection, the tempus-fugit concurrency library, concurrent testing
- **Testing**: JUnit, JMock, Scalamock, acceptance testing, TDD, BDD, Concordion, test reliability
- **Scala**: Scala programming, implicits, type classes, mixins, functional error handling
- **Functional Programming**: Lambdas, closures, currying, monads, higher-order functions, pure functions
- **Agile**: Pair programming, XP, agile coaching, interviewing, team skills, lead time, cycle time, pull requests
- **Raspberry Pi**: Pi hardware projects, Raspbian setup and upgrades, IoT, temperature logging
- **Tools**: Git, Mac tips, IntelliJ IDEA, build tools, developer productivity
- **Web**: HTTP, REST APIs, OAuth, URL encoding
